title: Park Finder
description: This was my final year project. It's an IoT project using the NodeMCU micro-controller kit which detects if there is a car present in a particular parking space, and saves the status in the database. The Android app uses the data along with Google Maps API to plot markers showing free space across different locations.

title: Backslash Fest Website
